label: 勘解由使
対訳語: Investigators of the Records of Outgoing Officials
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Officials of the central government whose duty it was to investigate the documents of honorable dismissal (geyujō) to make sure there was no collusion between the incoming and outgoing officials. [解由状]
